thread.section_title: APMEX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of APMEX | www.apmex.com | 8 of 382
thread.title: Collect_it

author: Collect_it
title: Collect_it
text: Over the years I've purchased multiple times from this company and what i received every time was exactly how coins and bars should be: the best price and highest quality for that price. APMEX offers twice the amount of products compared to other *---*Bullion companies in the US. A specific coin i sought was $42 on one leading Bullion site, and found the exact same coin on APMEX for $29. Thats why i always come back to this company. Excellence in many ways !
